name: PixelShowDown
description:
Hi :)

NEW! click the 9 button to take cash from your enemy However you will get arrested  (in the game if you get defeated)

-----Important------------

CLICK DOWN ARROW TO RUN AWAY FROM ENEMYS

Left arrow to go left

Right arrow to go right

Up arrow to go forward

Down arrow to go backwards (and run away from enemys)

use key z to drink potion

[Q] TO RELOAD

[E] to shoot

[1] to switch to pistol

[3] TO EAT CAKE

[4]TO EAT GOLD APPLE

[s] to scope
